scripts.build: echo '❌ Error: Please specify target and environment. Use npm run build:chrome:{env} or npm run build:firefox:{env} where env is dev or prod' && exit 1
scripts.build:chrome: echo '❌ Error: Please specify environment. Use npm run build:chrome:dev or npm run build:chrome:prod' && exit 1
scripts.build:firefox: echo '❌ Error: Please specify environment. Use npm run build:firefox:dev or npm run build:firefox:prod' && exit 1
scripts.prebuild:chrome:prod: npm run lint && npm run typecheck && cd .. && npm install --workspaces --legacy-peer-deps && npm run -w @jreader/shared-types-ts build
scripts.prebuild:chrome:dev: npm run lint && npm run typecheck && cd .. && npm install --workspaces --legacy-peer-deps && npm run -w @jreader/shared-types-ts build
scripts.prebuild:firefox:prod: npm run lint && npm run typecheck && cd .. && npm install --workspaces --legacy-peer-deps && npm run -w @jreader/shared-types-ts build
scripts.prebuild:firefox:dev: npm run lint && npm run typecheck && cd .. && npm install --workspaces --legacy-peer-deps && npm run -w @jreader/shared-types-ts build
scripts.dev: echo '❌ Error: Please specify target. Use npm run dev:chrome or npm run dev:firefox' && exit 1
scripts.predev:chrome: cd .. && npm install --workspaces --legacy-peer-deps && npm run -w @jreader/shared-types-ts build
scripts.predev:firefox: cd .. && npm install --workspaces --legacy-peer-deps && npm run -w @jreader/shared-types-ts build
scripts.clean: rm -rf dist dist-chrome-dev dist-chrome-prod dist-firefox-dev dist-firefox-prod
